snippet: Make It Rain: The Love of Money, which hit No. 1 last week on the App Store chart for free downloads, shows a world rigged in favor of the rich.
abstract: Chris Suellentrop discusses new hit mobile game Make It Rain: The Love of Money; holds that game's appeal turns on the seductive pursuit of wealth but ends up illustrating the corrupting influence of financial markets.
lead_paragraph: Make It Rain: The Love of Money, which hit No. 1 last week on the App Store chart for free downloads, shows a world rigged in favor of the rich.

headline.print_headline: Fleeting Game Says Investing Is Rigged
headline.main: Fleeting Game Says Investing Is Rigged
